name: World CHAMPIONS: Decathlon
description:
{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/Champions-poster_small_web.jpg

World CHAMPIONS: Decathlon
will be available SOON!

Wishlist and stay tuned!

World CHAMPS is a series of retro style sports games for whole Family.
World CHAMPIONS: Decathlon includes all favorite disciplines:
100 metres, Long jump, Shot put, High jump, 400 metres
110 metres hurdles, Discus throw, Pole vault, Javelin throw and 1500 metres

Compete with time in SIngle Player or in PvP Mode both - Online and Local!

MAIN FEATURES:
- Sports Simulator - 10 disciplines in Decathlon.
- Single Player, Multiplayer - Local and Online.
- Pixelart and animations - true to retro pixels and colors palette.
- Simple Fun for People of all age - simple Controlls and Rules.
- Character customization - choose Your Team or play solo.
- Achivements and Leaderboards.
more information and materials coming soon!

Remember to Wishlist and we`ll see You on Track and Field!
All the best!
